DOC.brief_summary: In Japan , post-approval execution post marketing surveillance ( PMS ) request Japanese Pharmaceutical Affairs Law ( J-PAL ) order accumulate safety efficacy data reexamination . Reexamination period define J-PAL . Eight year approval new substance , result PMS need submit part reexamination dossier Japanese regulatory authority , Ministry Health , Labour Welfare ( MHLW ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients EGFR mutationpositive inoperable recurrent NSCLC include . Exclusion criterion : None
